head.title: CSS Test: Vertical Position of Floats

body.p: Test passes if for each matching pair of colored boxes either:

ul.li: the top of the small box is level with the top of the big box or
the top of the big box is level with the bottom of the the small box and the small box crosses into the lefthand region marked by the blue box
